item.title: logstash - known error
item.description: I have been trying to make this work for about 1.5 hr. Looks like there is open bug - https://logstash.jira.com/browse/LOGSTASH-703 Helpful link: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/logstash-users/sZM03po7HJE What should work: grok { match => ["message", "regex to parse severity"], match => ["message", "regex to parse server IP"], match => ["message", "regex to parse user"] } What needs to be done instead You _should_ be able to do exactly what you listed at the bottom of your email, except that you'd need `break_on_match => false` so that it would parse each snippet for each message instead of just parsing the first one that matches.
